content:
Executability: Fully Executable
Check:
  all:
    - name: SAFFL
      operator: exists
    - name: SAFFL
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - 'Y'
        - 'N'
Core:
  Id: CDISC.ADAMIG.AD0023
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: >-
  Raise an error when SAFFL is present and has a value that is not Y or N
Outcome:
  Message: The values of SAFFL are not following the "Y, N" codelist
  Output Variables:
    - SAFFL
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: ADaMIG
        Version: '1.3'
        References:
          - Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '23'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Document: ADaM IG v1.3
                Section: '3.2'
                Item: Table 3.2.3
                Cited Guidance: >-
                  ADaM IG v1.3, Section 3.2, Table 3.2.3: Population Indicator(s)
                  have a Codelist / Controlled Term value of "Y, N".
      - Name: ADaMIG
        Version: '1.2'
        References:
          - Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '23'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Document: ADaM IG v1.2
                Section: '3.2'
                Item: Table 3.2.3
                Cited Guidance: >-
                  ADaM IG v1.2, Section 3.2, Table 3.2.3: Population Indicator(s)
                  have a Codelist / Controlled Term value of "Y, N".
      - Name: ADaMIG
        Version: '1.1'
        References:
          - Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '23'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Document: ADaM IG v1.1
                Section: '3.2'
                Item: Table 3.2.3
                Cited Guidance: >-
                  ADaM IG v1.1, Section 3.2, Table 3.2.3: Population Indicator(s)
                  have a Codelist / Controlled Term value of "Y, N".
      - Name: ADaMIG
        Version: '1.0'
        References:
          - Origin: ADaM Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '23'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '4.0'
            Citations:
              - Document: ADaM IG v1.0
                Section: '3.1'
                Item: Table 3.1.1
                Cited Guidance: >-
                  ADaM IG v1.0, Section 3.1, Table 3.1.1: Population Indicator(s)
                  have a Codelist / Controlled Term value of "Y, N".
Scope:
  Data Structures:
    Include:
      - SUBJECT LEVEL ANALYSIS DATASET
